item.title: My dying cousin ‘fell in love’ with his hospice nurse after 4 months. She inherited his entire estate. What can I do?

item.title: ‘I’ve nothing left for retirement’: My husband and I have 9 kids and $70,000 in student debt. How do we pay it off?
item.description: “We own our home and have about $30,000 in equity.”

item.title: ‘Why am I so afraid to retire?’ I’m 60 and lost $1.2 million in a divorce. Can I rebuild my life?
item.description: “If the rule of 4% is applied, I could use savings and the proceeds from my house sale to buy a condo, and at 62 draw $110,000 per year.”
